description: Commands to list and show script cmdlet resources.

commands.name: az vmware script-cmdlet list
commands.summary: List script cmdlet resources available for a private cloud to create a script execution resource on a private cloud.
examples: az vmware script-cmdlet list --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --script-package package1

commands.name: az vmware script-cmdlet show
commands.summary: Get information about a script cmdlet resource in a specific package on a private cloud.
examples: az vmware script-cmdlet show --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --script-package package1 --name cmdlet1
